Summary: The UFO was shaped like a boomerang in a disc form. It took about 30 seconds to become out of sight. It was a grayish color. It was kinda bright.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Buena Park
There were no other sightings in Buena Park on or around September 10th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at Willow Park practicing basketball when I looked up when I shot a shot. I thought it was like a special bird. So I kept on looking and I saw that it wasn't flying but streaking throught the air like an airplane. I saw a small flash for a second. So I wondered what it was. I lost sight of the object when it when behind a large tree. I tried to find it again but it was hopeless. I told everybody what I saw, but nobody believed me.
